00019 #ifndef _IPL98_CPOSITIONGROUP2DCONSTIT_H
00020 #define _IPL98_CPOSITIONGROUP2DCONSTIT_H
00021 
00022 #include <vector>
00023 #include "positiongroup2d_it.h"
00024 
00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00026 
00027 using std::vector;
00028 
00039 template<class T>
00040 class CPositionGroup2DConstIterator
00041 {
00042 protected: // attributes
00044         std::vector<T>::const_iterator m_It;
00045 public:
00047         CPositionGroup2DConstIterator(){ }
00049         CPositionGroup2DConstIterator(std::vector<T>::const_iterator It) :m_It(It){ }
00051         inline CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>& operator=(const CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>& It);
00053         inline CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>& operator=(const CPositionGroup2DIterator<T>& It);
00055         inline CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>& operator++() {++m_It; return *this;}
00057         inline CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T> operator++(int) {CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T> t = *this; m_It++; return t;}
00059         inline CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>& operator--() {--m_It; return *this;}
00061         inline CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T> operator--(int) {CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T> t = *this; m_It--; return t;}
00063         inline const T& operator*(){return *m_It;}
00065         inline const T* operator->(){return m_It;}
00068         friend bool operator==(const CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>& p, const CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>& q){return p.m_It==q.m_It;}
00071         friend bool operator!=(const CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>& p, const CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>& q){return !(p==q);}
00074         friend bool operator<(const CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>& p, const CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>& q){return p.m_It<q.m_It;}
00077         friend bool operator<(const CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>& p, const CPositionGroup2DIterator<T>& q){return p.m_It<&(*q);}
00078 };
00079 
00080 
00081 template<class T>
00082 inline CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>& CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>::operator=(const CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>& It)
00083 {
00084         m_It=It;
00085         return *this;
00086 }
00087 
00088 template<class T>
00089 inline CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>& CPositionGroup2DConstIterator<T>::operator=(const CPositionGroup2DIterator<T>& It)
00090 {
00091         m_It=&(*It);
00092         return *this;
00093 }
00094 
00095 } // end namespace ipl
00096 
00097 #endif //_IPL98_CPOSITIONGROUP2DCONSTIT_H
